mapper.insert: insert into ticket (tk_id, tk_status, dict_seat, dict_hall, dict_start_time, dick_end_time, cine_address, user_id, creat_time, update_time, mov_id) values (#{tkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictSeat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictHall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dickEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cineAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{movId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ticket set tk_status = #{tkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dict_seat = #{dictSeat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_hall = #{dictHall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_start_time = #{dictStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dick_end_time = #{dickEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cine_address = #{cineAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mov_id = #{movId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tk_id = #{tkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tk_id, tk_status, dict_seat, dict_hall, dict_start_time, dick_end_time, cine_address, user_id, creat_time, update_time, mov_id from ticket where tk_id = #{tkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
